metadata.title: CVE-2020-6378 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in speech in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.130 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
